liquidStaking.title: Liquid Staking
liquidStaking.heroDescriptionContinued: on your ETH with revolutionary liquid staking technology. No lock-up periods, instant withdrawals, guaranteed returns.
liquidStaking.howLiquidStakingWorksDescription: Traditional staking locks your ETH for months. Liquid staking lets you earn rewards while maintaining full access to your funds.
liquidStaking.step1Description: Transfer your ETH to Maple Wallet's liquid staking pool. Your funds remain under your control with instant withdrawal capability.
liquidStaking.step2Description: Start earning 0.65% daily returns immediately. Rewards are automatically credited to your account every 24 hours.
liquidStaking.step3Description: Unlike traditional staking, withdraw your ETH instantly without waiting periods or penalties. Your earnings continue until withdrawal.
liquidStaking.liquidVsTraditionalDescription: See why liquid staking is revolutionizing how people earn with ETH
liquidStaking.benefitsDescription: Experience the future of ETH staking with maximum flexibility and guaranteed returns
liquidStaking.benefit1Description: Access your ETH anytime. No waiting periods or unlock delays.
liquidStaking.benefit2Description: Earn 0.65% daily returns, credited automatically every 24 hours.
liquidStaking.benefit3Description: No slashing penalties or validator risks. Your rewards are guaranteed.
liquidStaking.benefit4Description: Rewards automatically compound, maximizing your earning potential.
liquidStaking.calculatorDescription: Calculate your potential earnings with Maple Wallet liquid staking
liquidStaking.annualYieldNote: Based on 0.65% daily returns with compound interest
liquidStaking.faq1Answer: Liquid staking allows you to earn staking rewards while maintaining the ability to use, trade, or withdraw your staked assets. Unlike traditional staking that locks your ETH, liquid staking keeps your funds liquid and accessible.
liquidStaking.faq2Question: How can Maple Wallet guarantee 0.65% daily returns?
liquidStaking.faq2Answer: Our liquid staking pool uses advanced DeFi strategies, yield farming, and institutional partnerships to generate consistent returns. The diversified approach ensures stable 0.65% daily yields regardless of market conditions.
liquidStaking.faq3Question: What's the minimum amount for liquid staking?
liquidStaking.faq3Answer: There's no minimum requirement! You can start liquid staking with any amount of ETH, from 0.001 ETH upwards. This makes it accessible to everyone, unlike traditional staking that requires 32 ETH.
liquidStaking.faq4Question: Are there any fees for liquid staking?
liquidStaking.faq4Answer: Maple Wallet charges no deposit fees. A small performance fee is deducted from your daily rewards to maintain the platform and ensure consistent returns. Your principal remains completely fee-free.
liquidStaking.faq5Question: How quickly can I withdraw my staked ETH?
liquidStaking.faq5Answer: Instantly! That's the beauty of liquid staking. You can withdraw your ETH at any time without waiting periods, unlock delays, or penalties. Your funds are always available when you need them.
liquidStaking.ctaDescription: Join the liquid staking revolution. Earn 0.65% daily returns with zero lock-up and instant withdrawals.
liquidStaking.footerCopyright: ¬© 2024 Maple Wallet - Revolutionary Liquid Staking Platform. All rights reserved.

twoFactorAuth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.subtitle: Secure your account with an additional layer of protection using Google Authenticator or similar TOTP apps.
twoFactorAuth.accountRecoveryDescription: Your 12-character private key for password recovery
twoFactorAuth.securityWarning1: This key can reset your password - keep it secure!
twoFactorAuth.securityWarning2: Store it in a safe place (password manager, secure notes)
twoFactorAuth.securityWarning3: Never share this key with anyone
twoFactorAuth.securityWarning4: This key is shown only on this page
twoFactorAuth.howToUseDescription: If you forget your password, you can use this 12-character key along with your email address to reset your password on the login page.
twoFactorAuth.failedToLoad: Failed to load private key. Please refresh the page.
twoFactorAuth.privateKeyGeneratedDescription: Your account recovery key has been created. Please save it securely.
